channel.title: Poss jump into party wastes both charges of jump
channel.description: #### What happened? I was possessor and tried to jump into a butler (first jump of the game). The butler partied, I got occupied (since party bypasses occ immunity). I lost BOTH charges of my jump. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I guess i was supposed to lose only one charge (if any), since my jump was cancelled. If that's on purpose (and not a bug), I don't get the point of losing both charges there. #### Steps to reproduce: Be a possessor. Try to jump into a butler who is partying that night. Lose both charges of jump.

item.title: Poss jump into party wastes both charges of jump
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I have experienced and reported this bug too like 2 patches ago, but it seems it has not been fixed yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Poss jump into party wastes both charges of jump
item.dc:creator: TruthTeller
item.description:
What happened?

I was possessor and tried to jump into a butler (first jump of the game).
The butler partied, I got occupied (since party bypasses occ immunity).
I lost BOTH charges of my jump.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I guess i was supposed to lose only one charge (if any), since my jump was cancelled.
If that’s on purpose (and not a bug), I don’t get the point of losing both charges there.

Steps to reproduce:

Be a possessor.
Try to jump into a butler who is partying that night.
Lose both charges of jump.

Read full topic
item.source: Poss jump into party wastes both charges of jump
